name: Amulet
passiveSkills: Increase the duration of beneficial effects on self and a random ally by 1 turn after each action
Transform Perfect and Passive Disable on each ally into Heal Amp for 2 turns every action
Transform Immunity and Perfect Immunity effects on enemies into Doom for 2 turns if Heal Amp is active on any ally at the start of your turn
Inflict Perfect Sleep for 1 turn on each enemy inflicted with Doom at the start of your turn.
